title: My Sexy Landlord: Forbidden Fantasies
description: “I would like to watch you make yourself cum,” he stated clearly.  With those words Leah is set on a path of pleasure she never imagined she'd be on.  When her landlord stumbles upon her masturbating in her apartment he doesn't mention the leaky faucet he's come to fix or the late rent she hasn't turned in. But instead he offers her a proposition that she'd be foolish to refuse. Nor does she really want to...
author: Izabelle George
